original_text: The Lord will not stop being angry, until he has finished what he has decided to do. When the time comes, you will understand this clearly. The Lord will not stop being angry,
korean_text: 여호와의 진노가 내 마음의 뜻하는 바를 행하여 이루기까지는 그치지 아니하나니 너희가 끝날에 그것을 완전히 깨달으리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will not stop being angry
until he has finished what he has decided to do
The Lord will not stop being angry
